thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Strongpoint Asa Recruits Jacob Tveraabak As Next CEO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Strongpoint Asa Recruits Jacob Tveraabak As Next CEO
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - STRONGPOINT ASA:
* LEADERSHIP CHANGE IN STRONGPOINT * WOULD NOW LIKE TO START A LEADERSHIP HAND-OVER OF COMPANY TO HIS SUCCESSOR
* BOARD AND WAALER HAVE DURING SOME TIME WORKED ON A SUCCESSION PLAN FOR CEO ROLE
* RECRUITED JACOB TVERAABAK AS STRONGPOINTS NEXT CEO. * THEY HAVE RECRUITED JACOB TVERAABAK, AGE 42, AS STRONGPOINTS NEXT CEO.
* TVERAABAK WILL JOIN COMPANY APRIL 3RD. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
